I was at first really pleased with this top. It fit well but it has a tag that I cut out but it still itches. The tag is sewn into the top. I'm 5'6", 142 lbs and it runs true to size, I usually wear a medium, however, I prefer the large. It doesn't rise up as much with the larger size, which all tight fitting tops do when you bend over or reach for something. The large size fits well too, & a little longer. This top is stretchy.

Just as pictured. The length is great, love that it is ribbed, and the material has just the right amount of stretch. It's comfy and the color is just as I expected. I got the khaki in a large. I typically wear a large in tops and the fit is just right.

I ordered 2 different colors.  One came neatly folded with tags attached.  The other was stuffed in the bag,  wrinkled,  no tags,  & VERY strong perfume smell.  Disappointed with the deceitful sale.  However,  the product itself is GREAT!  I love the quality of the fabric, the cut, & the fit.  It does run quite small.  I usually wear a size small.  The large fits perfectly (definitely not loose at all either). I'll replace the smelly used one & maybe even buy another color or two.

I bought this top a a laying  purposes. The material is soft and pretty  versatile.  The top is thick enough that is not see through but not too warm . You can use this through out the year.

I LOVE THESE SHIRTS. Soft, comfy, true to size. I am never able to get shirts that fit my body because I have big boobs but don’t want to show too much cleavage. Surprisingly, these shirts were perfect amount of coverage and showed skin without it being too much. I started with just Orange and Dark green colors because the reviews were so positive so I trusted getting two. Afterwards I ordered 3 more! The top going left to right are: Dark green, Army Green Bottom left to right: Dark blue, Red, Caramel These colors are very true to the pictures, not dimming at all from how they actually look. I will be returning Army green though, I thought it would look more ‘green’ but it’s really light-dependent and more of a brown-swampy green. Not what I was looking for. Dark green on the contrary is a good Green/Teal in some lights and is what I am wearing in the mirror picture.  I am 5’3 160lbs and I ordered a large. Sleeves we’re perfect length, long enough to cover my stomach but I tucked the shirt into my pants, and the material very soft and not cinching or too tight but also stayed fit on my body. This is the first time I trusted reviews enough to get two shirts without knowing the quality and it did not disappoint. Hope this can help someone else into finding this amazing shirt!
